text: We will inspire the world.

We are all sitting down
so that we can write our words
of inspiration for the future.
I really think the future

should be of peace
and happiness.

I feel there should be
no discrimination.

There should be no racism.
Nothing like that.

What I want to see
in the future

is just everybody collabing
with each other.

I'm talking about television,
acting, movies.

People just being
even more creative

and just coming up with
new ideas in different ways.

I just wish for the people
of the future to be wise,

wiser than we are,
wiser than everyone before us.
Just to gain wisdom.

Dream big,
think outside the box,
and live your best life.

That's what I hope the mantra
for the future is.
( laughs )

Yolanda:
We will make a difference.
